Flow.description: A wizard driven flow to add child object to a timeline configuration.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Navigation behaviour when clicking on the timeline item title.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: NavigationBehaviour

Flow.label: Add Child object to Config

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_add_filter_criteria
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add filter criteria?

screens.description: Select if the related record is being provided by an Apex class or a related record of the primary object.
screens.name: Is_Apex_or_Related_Record
screens.label: Is Apex or Related Record
screens.helpText: You can either display a related record or select an apex class that implements timeline__IDataProvider interface.

fields.name: var_NavigationBehaviour
fields.fieldText: When clicking on title where should the page navigate to?

fields.name: display_icon_warning
fields.fieldText: Selecting an icon will override the default icon image for {!var_childObjectApiName}

fields.name: display_confirmation
fields.fieldText: Your child record configuration has been created !!!

fields.name: Copy_1_of_display_confirmation
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong with creation the timeline child configuration:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: external_key_text
fields.fieldText: You can set an External Key for the child record or leave the field empty
